channel.title: Changin starter pack starter items and pk thingys
channel.description:
im trying to change my starter pack but i cant find it??
and where to find starter items?
and where can i change the pk place i mean they pking at shops how to delete it?

item.title: Changin starter pack starter items and pk thingys
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:
@moerin wrote:

no wait, here
go to Player.java
and search for
//Giving the player an unique look

And u see like this

		//Giving the player an unique look
		playerEquipment[playerHat]=3751;
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=6568;
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=1127;
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=1201;
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1079;
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=7460;
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=4131;
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=6735;
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

[hr]
Hat is Helmet
Cape is You know Fire cape etc.
Amulet is Str amulet or fury
Chest is Platebody or Playechest or Chainbody etc.
Shield is Dragon Sq shield or rune shield etc.
LEgs is for rune platelegs or dragon or bandos or anything else
hands are Gloves.
Feet is Boots
Ring is like Forging ring of Ring of stone etc,
Arrrows are like RuneArrows or DragonArrows
Weapon is like Dscim or Dlong or dds or rune scim etc whip.
[hr]
Changes it to the ids of the items.

~0bby

Read full topic
